title: Error Message
body: I was approved to become part of the PBE, but whenever I try to go make an account it won't load the PBE page. I have cleared my history, restarted my computer, and tried exiting the site and reloading it. The Error gives me is error 500. Please help me.

replies.body: I was able to see that you were approved for the PBE, but we can't force create accounts.  The error message you're receiving is a known issue that we're looking into.  I don't have an ETA or more information on the issue, but I know some players were able to resolve it by using a VPN.  Hopefully, that can work for you.  I hope that helps!
